website_summaries.verdict: Pair music and interior lighting together for a unique automotive atmosphere.
pros: Features 4 RGB light strips with 48 total LED lights
Uses a clever remote for color selection as well as brightness, fade transitions, and musical cues
Built-in microphone can change light color in conjunction with music or even your own singing voice
cons: Customers have claimed the lights are dimmer than expected, and the adhesive doesn’t last long

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work. Company contacted after bad review and offered refund
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work straight out of the box. Had 2 other people make sure. unfortinatly we didn’t find this out right away as are busy lives. So just got ready to do a return and see it’s to late. After leaving review company contacted me offering to exchange or refund my money if I would change rating. Very nice of them to do there best In making it right!
customer_reviews.author: Sterlinmay

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but have issues. **Issues solved**
customer_reviews.text: ***UPDATE*** The manufacturer reached out to me and sent a replacement remote. This has fixed the issue and I can now easily change the colors without mashing the buttons. I also no longer need to hold the remote right next to the receiving unit. I am LOVING these lights! **Original Review** Very easy to install, And the lights look great. I'm giving it only 3 stars due to the fact that the remote hardly works. I have to mash the buttons multiple times just to change the light colors. I've switched out the battery. That did not fix the issue. I also have to hold the remote very close to the receiver to change the color.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: don’t buy this if you live in a hot humid climate
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for . First off I would not recommend this product if you live in a climate where your car gets very hot and humid inside. This was an absolute waste of money for that reason. I tried both the adhesive side of the LED lights and Velcro strips and they can’t stick no matter how much I try. The remote is okay, every other click works and it has to be pointed DIRECTLY at the receiver The color display on the LEDs is pretty bright
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. This is a terrible product. The adhesive has fallen off twice now on two different lights, on all 4 strips half of the blue LEDs no longer work, and on two of the strips some of the red ones have failed as well. There is no support for this company, I have googled and googled and came up with nothing. So I can't even ASK for a replacement. LEDs are supposed to last for at least 30,000 hours. I have not even owned this product for more than 5,000 hours. Terrible product, waste of money. Buy something from a company with an actual support staff and reputable name.
customer_reviews.author: DXR

customer_reviews.title: I love my lights
customer_reviews.text: I love my lights!!! It was easy to install. I do recommend finding a YouTube to learn how to hide the wires. Just allows for a much cleaner look. I like how you can adjust the lights to blink to your music or fade in and out. You can also change the colors. It was a bargain, definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: 2blessed2Bstressed

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright lights 💡 (Everybody Compliment this Lights in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright lights 💡 (Everybody Compliment this Lights in my Car 🚗 ) even, some of my friends told me to order these lights for them. Easy Set Up 💯 . RECOMMEND IT 🙌🏻 UPDATE: This Light Were Good But They Don’t Last Long only a Few Months, using them Sometimes Not Always. I WILL RECOMMEND YOU GUYS TO BUY A MORE EXPENSIVE ONE !
customer_reviews.author: Wilmi Nolasco

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and fantastic value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a brand new Subaru Impreza Sport and it offered LED light package in the front footwells as an option. Looked very cool. BUT it was $500 and only ONE color red or blue. This not only offers many different colors, it has different flashing patterns including flash to music! Plus, there are 4 strands so can light up back seats too all for fraction of the price!!!! I would and did buy gorilla double sided tape to prevent falling but no problems otherwise! And yes you can have set to one color only if you choose. Maybe the best product I have ever bought on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: i know what i hear

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lights! Easy way to add some style to your interior.
customer_reviews.text: These lights were simple to install and have not come loose at all. I used one strip under the dash and one under the front seat for both driver and passenger sides. The lights are nice and bright and the colors are easy to change with the remote. The only slight con, and this might be car related more than the lights, but sometimes a decent bump may cause the lights to flicker or go off. This could be due to the outlet that it is in and how well the connection is. A secure fit in the outlet should prevent this.
customer_reviews.author: Sean F

customer_reviews.title: The idea is great, the quality...
customer_reviews.text: I love the lights I love how they look in the car and how they switch colors to the music. The first item I got wouldn't stick at all. Returned it and re bought it. Had it for about 2 months now and one of the stick parts is coming off on one of them. All in all for the price I cant expect much more. Will put double sided tape once it comes off. I truly enjoy the look it gives the car and have gotten many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: ca

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great in my Kia Soul
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for Lyft to add a little light in my vehicle while driving at night. This was super easy for me to install and hide all the wires fortunately. I saw some bad reviews mostly complaining about the adhesive which was a small concern of mine, but I have had no issues with it myself, they are stuck solid to my car and working great. I would ignore a good portion of the negative reviews because if you can't work around the adhesive for the price of these lights I really just hope your not a handyman =)
customer_reviews.author: Extreme

customer_reviews.title: great interior lights
customer_reviews.text: i bought two pairs of these one for my rav4 and one for my wife's crosstrek cause she loved mine so much. they are nice and bright and very easy to install. the adhesive did not work for my rav4 probably cause my plastic is slippery but for my wife the adhesive that it came with worked perfectly no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Roel Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first, but actually really nice.
customer_reviews.text: By reading the reviews i saw alot of people had problems with the remote, but mine works perfectly fine. It syncs nicely with my music, and has alot of different effects. Im glad i made this purchase, and hopefully when you purchase it you get a good set like i did. Really easy to install and honestly the hardest part was trying to find tape that actually sticks! The lights stick perfectly and tightly on, and dont damage your interior when you take it off. HOWEVER, make sure you put them where you want the FIRST time because you'll lose the stickiness after taking it off once.
customer_reviews.author: destinymaravi

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Product
customer_reviews.text: First Review I've ever done and this product well deserves it. I received it a couple of days ago and i haven't stopped getting compliments on it. I installed it into my truck and i had to get tricky with how I could hide the wires. It mostly involved patience and wire tape but i got it done and it looks great. Not only are they bright but very vibrant too. I rate 8/10 only because of the hassle of having to hide the wires and the box with the Receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Price

customer_reviews.title: They are pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: These lights are GREAT. I love them so much. Makes my car so much better when listening to music. I sometimes sit in my car to just look at them going with the music. The only things I had complains are, I couldn't really find a place to put them in the back. So I kinda had to improves but not all cars are the same. Another is, make sure you FIRST make the wires not noticeable. I didn't know when I installed and now I see wires. I mean it's not the end of the world, but I'd recommend know where your gonna hide the wires before installing. Great item for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: installed easily and all the colors and functions work as does ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described, installed easily and all the colors and functions work as does the remote. The only gripe I have is because of the environment I am in the noise and vibration don't allow the music bit to work. Overall though I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful lights and they did good for about 3 months - easy to put on/ use/ etc.... but after 3 months they kept falling off . The stick part that the light uses to stick to your car just doesn’t last very long :(
customer_reviews.author: Bebe Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Placed where I wanted them and works great! The lights were easy to install and very bright, goes great with the music and adds a great evening of fun and enjoyable listening while the light show goes with the beat of the music as its descriptions states! MG
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The stickiness could be better. don’t really like all the cords everywhere but it’s not that bad. colors are really bright. like REALLY bright
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive doesn’t stick
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive wouldn’t stick to my car on its own so I had to use double sided tape as well to make them stay in place. Otherwise they work well and the remote allows you to change the light colors. The flashing lights option doesn’t follow along to the beat of each individual song though, I think it just has preset beats that they hope will look like they match the song. But they work well overall and besides the tricky installation I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great For Rideshare
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for rideshare. If you hate sitting in the dark with your riders, then this will do the job!
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Noice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my coupe. They work great and are very well made and bright. My only improves would be; allow dimming with the special modes, it only works with solid colors; the IR reciving sensor for the remote needs to be a part of the processor housing or make it easier to adhere to things, or make it RF instead; and improve the ability to have the lights sound activated. It only works at the perfect volume and is also triggered by bumps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, easy to install and definitely feels durable. Adhesive is strong.. avoid putting on anything isn't solid such a fabric because it'll obviously not adhere like desired. Easy to turn off and on. Bright but not bright enough to be obnoxious or intrusive
customer_reviews.author: nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: **UPDATE** Innlight’s customer service offered to send a replacement item or do a full refund since the lights I got shorted out. I’m happy. If it didn’t short out the second time I turned it on after installing the it around my car, I would give it a better review. For the cost of it and if it lasted, it would seem like a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Eskridge

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long!
customer_reviews.text: The led worked great for 10 months then the just stopped working. The adhesive doesn’t stay very well either. Not the best quality product, but you kinda get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelJB

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: very easy to install, i was expecting the lights to be brighter i stuck it to carpet because no metal under seat to latch onto seems to hold fairly well. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Berly had them for a week now for some reason they won’t work. It’s sad because I actually loved the product but now it’s useless
customer_reviews.author: Manuel G

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it unless you live in an all year warm climate
customer_reviews.text: After one winter (Not even a year) they stopped working and the remote control colors don’t match what shows up and some of them don’t work. Waste of money unless you live in Florida or maybe somewhere dry and doesn’t get winters.
customer_reviews.author: Eryne

customer_reviews.title: great for under-dash lights or accent!
customer_reviews.text: I installed these in my 68 Firebird convertible resto because I didn't have any inside lighting. They come with a cigarette lighter plug as the power source so I bought a socket to complete the install and hid it all up behind my dash. They work great and throw lots of light. We use clear for when we need light and turn them to color when we just want swag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!$$$$
customer_reviews.text: Biggest bang for the buck! Lights look great!! Considering how much more affordable these are compared to the rest that’s for sale. I hardwired mine to a switch instead of using the bulky cigarette lighter adapter. Hopefully they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Lights up the car with color
customer_reviews.text: I drive Uber on the weekends. The passengers that have had a bit of beverage love it when I turn up the music and then turn on the lights.
customer_reviews.author: David Hall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product! It’s a little hard to install if you don’t know your way around your car, but overall great and easy to use. The music sensor is a bit sensitive so if you do hit a bump and your music is playing the bump might change the color, but other than that it’s great, bought one for myself and someone else!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my truck. The adhesion fell down in less than 2 hours. I followed all the instructions and did all the proper prep. Expected more for what I paid
customer_reviews.author: Produce Queen

customer_reviews.title: Used on a portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a homemade portable speaker. Very easy to install, The glue is VERY strong, it’s very bright. No problems. I definitely plan on purchasing another kit
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Berberich

customer_reviews.title: Bright lights
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and it’s actually pretty cool. It flashes to the beat of the music plus can set it to a solid color. Nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alan sunday

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install,  works well and looks great.  but that remote is cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I installed these inside my 2018 Dodge Challenger . The installation was very easy and only took about 20 minutes from unboxing to fully functional lights that look amazing. The only and I do mean only negative thing to say would be that the remote is very cheaply made and sometimes fails to work ( ....yes, I am pointing it directly at the receiver that's connected to the black box).
customer_reviews.author: Terry Edick

customer_reviews.title: 4strips.
customer_reviews.text: Adhesive sorta blows. Doesn’t want to stick even to clean surfaces but with enough patientce you can get it to. The box that’s supposed to go on a speaker for music settings is way too close to the plug and I’m pretty sure is impossible in any car set up. Infrared receiver for remote is also incredibly short. All in all tho it’s what I wanted out of them and I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for price.
customer_reviews.text: Cannot best this for the price. Works perfectly and easily installed. Installed in my 2014 Jeep Wrangler JKU. Wires could be a little longer for install but still worked perfect with enough to hide all wires. Would buy again and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Moore

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP, FAST DELIVERY, EASY INSTALLATION.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it Sunday. Was here on Wednesday! Took about 15 minutes to install and BAM! Easy as 1, 2, 3. Remote DOES come with battery. There IS PLENTY of wiring! If you're just a smidge short, MAKE IT WORK! These people get to you fast, you can install it and make it look good! I believe in you. If this installation causes you to use profanity, feel free to call or text and i'll pray for you!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Keith

customer_reviews.title: ITSSSS LITTTTT
customer_reviews.text: My brother is the one that bought it and he loves it!!!! When he is dj’ing in his room he turns it on and it brings in the club vibes!! He is ordering another one to finish his room and is very impressed what the lights can do. He’s just waiting on the google home to come in the mail. Overall 10/10 recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: miss_rejane

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought light before and they were not as bright as these ones, these lights are bright for certain colors, u can change the lights, the only problem I have is pointing the remote to the receiver that it has to be close
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights
customer_reviews.text: These are great lights for inside my truck topper. Easy to install and use. A lot of options too for intensity and color.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dews

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty cute they are colorful...my only issue is the housing on the wires can come loose so some electrical tape would be my advice
customer_reviews.author: houseoftori

customer_reviews.title: My husband used this in his truck and he loves it
customer_reviews.text: They added a unique touch to the interior of our truck. We put them under our dash to use when driving so we wouldn't have to turn on the overhead lights. They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright.  Loooove them!!
customer_reviews.text: Game changer for my camaro. Remote must be pointed directly at power source though which is annoying bc it’s inside the console.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Meador

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect and lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: perfect length to access for all 4 seats and nice remote that comes along with the kit. Lights have worked for well over a year now and no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Randy L

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Installed and eyes his in less then 5 min, just plug the lights into your cigarette lighter adapter and place the light under the dash board and under the seats. Adhesive that comes on the back of not that strong. I used gorilla tape to stick it under the dash and under the seats works just fine and stays in place. Great product installed on a 2011 Mitsubishi outlander SE awd
customer_reviews.author: DEMO

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Good product I guess for the price but I’m sure there are better
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Had to take it off for unrelated reasons. But was great colors. And everything. A lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Stickiness wears off fast
customer_reviews.text: It was nice and very pretty but after time the stickiness wore off and they no longer stick to the inside parts of my car.
customer_reviews.author: Dakotah Armes

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's easy to install. But at the highest setting the lights are very dim. For being LED I'm disappointed in the brightness. Easy to install, adhesion is good, but the most important is the brightness and that's poor.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian pina

customer_reviews.title: Get product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, I've got them in my semi and it lights up my entire cab and I love keeping them on all night and the music makes the lights flicker and other drivers always come over to see what I've got in there. It was super easy to install and hook up and I'd recommend them to anyone that wants lights inside their truck!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disco!
customer_reviews.text: Works really good. I was able to align the wires and not have them really move much. My only suggestion would be, put the passenger side one the same sife of the mirror. I put mine opposite and the LEDS mirror off lol
customer_reviews.author: Kwam

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: DIDNT STICK AT ALL...KEPT ON FALLING DOWN...WIRES ARE NOT EASY TO NAVAGATE...SENT BACK!
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Mckinnon

customer_reviews.title: Good, but use your own tape
customer_reviews.text: They're great, but use your own tape or zip ties to secure them. The remote control is also super weak.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this for her car and had a friend put it in for her which took no time at all. She loves it and my wife even kind of likes it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for spiffing up my daughters power wheel. Ran some 16 gauge wires from the positive and negative of the cigarette lighter (didn’t want to cut the cigarette lighter off) to the 12v battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lit Driving
customer_reviews.text: Only issue was the sticky side didn’t stick on to my dash so just have the lights under my seats but best $15 spent for my car to get hyphy with music
customer_reviews.author: Brian Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: 16 year old loved it and still does. It has stayed put since I “installed” it.
customer_reviews.author: Evan H.

customer_reviews.title: Freshen up your car's interior. . these are cool !
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids have them in their cars. . they love them
customer_reviews.author: Amir Dia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: I hardwired it to my car's fuse box (really easy, just look it up on youtube) and its (almost) perfect! The only cons is that they DO NOT DIM and it's not really great at matching the LED lights to the music. But it's not really a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alan H.

customer_reviews.title: Add some custom to any vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: My teen installed and if he can do it, anybody can do it.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product needs longer cables
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and I like the color patterns my only complaint is the cables are not long enough but otherwise excellent product
customer_reviews.author: LJ Burkhardt

customer_reviews.title: Get Velcro with this
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply doesn’t last long the “sticky” part Wears off really fast remotes great lights are great too many cords so not great presentation in the car
customer_reviews.author: Alas

customer_reviews.title: It lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchased this item. The first time was for my girlfriend and it has worked absolutely perfect. This time I purchased it for my cousins new car and mine. Very easy to install and it works amazing
customer_reviews.author: Silmar Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Good lights work great I have installed them in both my vehicles.. The adhesive however do not stick for very long.
customer_reviews.author: C.DUB

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: They are bright and like all the different color options
customer_reviews.author: Dean A Littman II

customer_reviews.title: ... they wouldn't work correctly or the lights would be dull. But to my surprise they were easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little reluctant to order these for my son because I thought they wouldn't work correctly or the lights would be dull. But to my surprise they were easy to install, very bright & had multiple color modes. My son is very happy which makes me happy. I'm even thinking of ordering some more in the near future. I HIGHLY RECCOMEND THESE LIGHTS!
customer_reviews.author: JBMS_6

customer_reviews.title: Nice while they last
customer_reviews.text: I liked them but they broke after a few months. One of the lights stopped working, then another stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Try a different one
customer_reviews.text: It was nice that the remote came with a battery but the remote itself was broken. So none of the features work and it’s stuck on red. I basically lost $17 because I hate the color red.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Test your product ASAP!
customer_reviews.text: After buying these, they sat on a shelf for about 3 months because I wasn’t ready to install them on my golf cart project. Once I did, the turned on to a weird aqua color and the remote didn’t work. I figured the battery was maybe dead, okay no big deal just replace it. Nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Rodiguez

customer_reviews.title: Great option for interior lighting
customer_reviews.text: Lights are great, good brightness remote is easy to use when used properly overall a very good product. My only issue was the adhesive which was a little lacking on some parts of my car but that could just be the material in my car. Otherwise excellent product that works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa Zaidi

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Quick Install for the Ladies
customer_reviews.text: I love how the strip light gives a sporty, luxe look to the interior of my car. It was super easy and quick to install! I recommend installing at night, it's immediately gratifying to see the finished look!
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely happy with the way these turned out in my car. I wired them to the 12v cigarette lighter in the back of the dashboard behind the radio and I hid all of the wires under the cars trim. Everything looks beautiful and the wire length is very long for any sized car to go under the front dash and underneath the front seats to have amazing lighting throughout the car.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Bad remote
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My only complaint is that once I ran all the wires under my center console the remote doesn't work. The lights are very bright.
customer_reviews.author: mtz1026

customer_reviews.title: Neasy and cool
customer_reviews.text: Makes my car look so cool and easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this in the car at night especially when it's set to light along with the music
customer_reviews.author: Helen LeeQuay-Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Choice
customer_reviews.text: After using these for over a month, they are great quality for an amazing price! The adhesive sticks great and the wires are the perfect length. The remote is working flawlessly along with the cigarette lighter power supply. It took me only 5 minutes to set up! I highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Can be a trick to install and make it look clean but with a little elbow grease it is done well. Remote control works perfect and has a variety of different color options. Starts to fall apart after six months
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Not quality
customer_reviews.text: Still works fine but they came out of their sticky protection films easily
customer_reviews.author: Paul Meregini

customer_reviews.title: It works well.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install looks great adhesion is okay by now I had them for almost 2 years and they're working with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: worth it.
customer_reviews.text: this lights are very nice looking....it makes car looking like millions dollar car.... very nice decoration for car.....seller is very helpful and responsible....I gave 5 🌟.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Led light interior multicolored
customer_reviews.text: Nice multicolor led Car looks like disco Quality is very good
customer_reviews.author: Woong Paik

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery accurate description.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the description for the length of the wires. I looked at other lights and decided on these because the length of the wire, and my intentions. Arrived sooner than expected which was an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Malone

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't turn on or show any signs of life. It was a gift for my boyfriend and ended up being a complete disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Petty

customer_reviews.title: Flights
customer_reviews.text: Super cool awesome lights around my car makes like a party
customer_reviews.author: Keren

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: Work great. The music feature works as designed. But in practical sense isn’t that great. But the lights themselves work great.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Nyman

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and was very easy to install. Get complements on them all the time. Has a variety of colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Dani

customer_reviews.title: Great lights, perfect glow at night
customer_reviews.text: I put these under the dash in my 2014 Ford F-150. I love them. I’ve had them for about a year. Easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value for any car!
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome in my car, easy to install, good value, just make sure you point remote at receiver so the lights change when you want them to
customer_reviews.author: knovak10

customer_reviews.title: Not working properly
customer_reviews.text: I just put this in my car and I was liking it, it's been 3 days now and the lights no longer go with the music on music mode and one of the music buttons doesnt work with any lights at all
customer_reviews.author: Steve Schwamlein

customer_reviews.title: Remote doesn’t work on first day.
customer_reviews.text: I showed my wife what I installed today in my Wrangler and the remote stopped working. Will not function in my first day. Tried everything. The lights look terrific and function well. Need a replacement remote ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Just what we expected.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we expected. Works as expected, installed by my 16 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: angela1960

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick as well as anticipated
customer_reviews.text: We ended up having to get additional Velcro straps to stick the lights on because they kept falling off. But other than that one small issue, they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Britny Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Very fun light.
customer_reviews.text: It installs fine. The remote allows you to change to one of 7 colors, set it to fade between the colors, or jump between the colors (think rave). It also has some neat music settings where it changes color with the beat of the music.
customer_reviews.author: John (Michigan)

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: works awesome and pretty bright. remote works perfectly. easy to install you just have to find places to hide the wires.
customer_reviews.author: trevor

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and legit!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t believe the picture and description at first, due to the fact that there are many sellers trying to sell this product. I got anyway and I’m quite impressed!! The lights are really working and the remote is fine. The brightness is more than enough (adjustable by the remote). It’s very satisfying and totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan.

customer_reviews.title: To be honest the lights look good, the remote works fine
customer_reviews.text: To be honest the lights look good, the remote works fine, the only issue is that the cables are made of cheap materials and the plastic that covers them started falling apart, well nothing that some tape cant fix.
customer_reviews.author: Baltazar alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Super happy An impressed with this! Great price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! So many options, great quality, remote works excellent with switching color options
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hey work good
customer_reviews.text: For the money very impressive the remote is hesitant sometimes but hey
customer_reviews.author: Kory k.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.!
customer_reviews.text: Great led lighting.! Super easy to install if you have a few minutes on your hand. Adhesive is great but does wear off after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer
